abstract: UnitedHealth Group informs investors that it plans to pull out of majority of states where it offers health insurance coverage under federal health care law; will only offer policies on public exchanges in handful of states in 2017, citing estimated losses on such plans of $1 billion in 2015 and 2016.
lead_paragraph: The company said it planned to withdraw from most states and offer policies on the public exchanges in only some states for 2017.

headline.main: UnitedHealth to Pull Back From Insurance Exchanges, Citing Losses
headline.print_headline: UnitedHealth Set to Exit Most States’ Exchanges

snippet: The company said it planned to withdraw from most states and offer policies on the public exchanges in only some states for 2017.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
